meanings.sent1: The avirulent plant posed no danger to the garden.
meanings.sent2: The avirulent virus did not make anyone sick.
meanings.sent3: The avirulent puppy was so gentle, it wouldn't even bark at strangers.
meanings.sent4: Her avirulent smile brightened up the room, spreading joy without any harm.
meanings.sent5: The avirulent rainbow painted the sky with beautiful colors, bringing happiness to all who saw it.

meanings.definition: Lacking the ability to cause disease
meanings.sent1: The avirulent bacteria in the water were harmless to humans.
meanings.sent2: The avirulent strain of flu did not make anyone sick.
meanings.sent3: The avirulent mosquito buzzed around, unable to spread any diseases.
meanings.sent4: His avirulent touch healed wounds instead of causing infections.
meanings.sent5: The avirulent air in the forest was pure and refreshing, free from any harmful pathogens.
